skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Decreases the target’s MAX HP by 30% of the damage inflicted.
Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 25% and instantly activates the Death’s Majesty Skill whenever this Champion or an ally receives a [Freeze] debuff.

Instantly removes any [Freeze] debuffs on this Champion and replaces them with a 30% [Increase C.RATE] buff, a 30% [Increase C.DMG] buff, and a 15% [Strengthen] buff whenever an enemy places a [Freeze] debuff on this Champion.
